thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Christina H
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Christina H

author: Christina H
title: Christina H
text: I have been purchasing books from ThriftBooks through Ebay for a few years and through their website as of late. I will continue to do so because this company is great to do business with. Books are shipped within 24 hours of purchasing and its GREAT! Thank you ThriftBooks for great service!
